casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Waddell et al., Appellants, v. McMonagle, Judge, Appellee.

[Cite as State ex rel. Waddell v. McMonagle (1996), 75 Ohio St.3d 396.]

(No. 95-1444 Submitted February 20, 1996 Decided April 3, 1996.) Hall & Hall, Mary Elaine Hall and Edison H. Hall, Jr., for appellants. Stephanie Tubbs Jones, Cuyahoga County Prosecuting Attorney, and Gregory B. Rowinski, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Wright, J., not participating.
